description.en: Provides the default type for children selection controls.
Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
Sets the component's name attribute.
Sets the DOM id on the component.
Puts the input in a manual error state.
Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.

Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). Find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).
Sets the height for the component.
Sets the maximum width for the component.
Sets the minimum width for the component.
Sets the width for the component.
Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.
The v-model value of the component. If component supports the **multiple** prop, this defaults to an empty array.
Removes the ability to click or target the component.
Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.
Creates a [v-icon](/api/v-icon/) component after default content in the **append** slot.
Puts input in readonly state.
Applies the [v-ripple](/directives/ripple) directive.
Displays radio buttons in row.
Sets the text of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.
Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare **model-value** and values contains in the **items** prop.
Forces a focused state styling on the component.
Vertically align **appendInner**, **prependInner**, **clearIcon** and **label** in the center.
Makes prepend/append icons full opacity when the input is focused and apply color.
Sets the color of the prepend/append icons.
Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.

items.formatted: "eager" | "lazy" | "blur" | "input" | "submit" | "invalid-input" | "blur lazy" | "input lazy" | "submit lazy" | "invalid-input lazy" | "blur eager" | "input eager" | "submit eager" | "invalid-input eager" | "lazy blur" | "lazy input" | "lazy submit" | "lazy invalid-input" | "eager blur" | "eager input" | "eager submit" | "eager invalid-input"

validateOn.formatted:
| 'eager'
  | 'lazy'
  | 'blur'
  | 'input'
  | 'submit'
  | 'invalid-input'
  | 'blur lazy'
  | 'input lazy'
  | 'submit lazy'
  | 'invalid-input lazy'
  | 'blur eager'
  | 'input eager'
  | 'submit eager'
  | 'invalid-input eager'
  | 'lazy blur'
  | 'lazy input'
  | 'lazy submit'
  | 'lazy invalid-input'
  | 'eager blur'
  | 'eager input'
  | 'eager submit'
  | 'eager invalid-input'

description.en: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.
Changes the direction of the input.
Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.
Hides spin buttons on the input when type is set to `number`.
Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the [persistent-hint](#props-persistent-hint) property.
Forces [hint](#props-hint) to always be visible.
Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.

Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.
The value used when applying validation rules.
Hides hint and validation errors. When set to `auto` messages will be rendered only if there's a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.
The target component to provide defaults values for.
The icon used when inactive.
The icon used when active.
Event that is emitted when the component's model changes.
Emitted when appended icon is clicked.
Event that is emitted when the component's focus state changes.
Emitted when prepended icon is clicked.

prepend.formatted:
{
  id: ComputedRef<string>
  messagesId: ComputedRef<string>
  isDirty: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isDisabled: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isReadonly: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isPristine: Ref<boolean, boolean>
  isValid: ComputedRef<boolean | null>
  isValidating: Ref<boolean, boolean>
  reset: () => void
  resetValidation: () => void
  validate: () => void
}

description.en: Adds an item outside the input and before input content.

{
  id: ComputedRef<string>
  messagesId: ComputedRef<string>
  isDirty: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isDisabled: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isReadonly: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isPristine: Ref<boolean, boolean>
  isValid: ComputedRef<boolean | null>
  isValidating: Ref<boolean, boolean>
  reset: () => void
  resetValidation: () => void
  validate: () => void
}

description.en: Adds an item inside the input and after input content.

details.formatted:
{
  id: ComputedRef<string>
  messagesId: ComputedRef<string>
  isDirty: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isDisabled: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isReadonly: ComputedRef<boolean>
  isPristine: Ref<boolean, boolean>
  isValid: ComputedRef<boolean | null>
  isValidating: Ref<boolean, boolean>
  reset: () => void

  validate: () => void
}

description.en: Slot for custom input details to modifying the display of [messages](#props-messages).
Slot used to customize the message content.
The default Vue slot.

label.text: { label: string | undefined; props: Record<string, any>; }

description.en: The default slot of the [v-label](/api/v-label/) or [v-field-label](/api/v-field-label/) component.
